name: Jelly Caretaker
description:
I'm currently working on the development of a Tamagotchi style game, in which the player is responsible for taking care of a small Jelly Blob.

In the current version, the player can:

-Press the four side buttons to boost the slowly decreasing stats.

-Press the menu button to pause the game.

-Press "D" to switch in and out of Debug Mode

-Press "C,V,B,N" in Debug Mode to decrease stats manually.
